item.title: WE HAVE MOVED [Pk-Scape]
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

[quote=“dizzle11, post:27, topic:526146”][quote author=i 3hit u link=topic=644890.msg4356374#msg4356374 date=1377697615]
As an event moderator of PK-Scape, Im proud to present u the latest 1v1 flats event done.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rjosj5yD3W4[/youtube]

Congratulations to the winners! More events will be coming soon! Don’t forget to check the forums!
[/quote]

dam half of those fights were won due to the laggyness of the server thats not something u should show off lol[/quote]

Lag is gone now … it was a technical problem on VPS company, not my fault. Now they have fixed it and server works proper !

Also i want to inform you we have done alot of nice updates, which u can read about on our forum www.Pk-Scape.org

See you in game !

P.S: This night we had 37 online again xD

Read full topic

item.title: WE HAVE MOVED [Pk-Scape]
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“Artemis Wp, post:23, topic:526146”]Thanks guys, hope to see this server more populated !!

Glad to announce you we just moved to http://www.pk-scape.org/ !!

The time is now … tomorrow (20.08.2013) @ 22:00 CEET (GMT+2) we will host a huge drop party ! Will be dropped : amulets, rune items, dragon meds, dragon sq, dragon weps, mask’s, crackers, scythe, pumpkins and easter eggs.

Hope to see you there !

Best regards,
Printz ![/quote]

Sounds good, Cant wait.

Read full topic

item.title: WE HAVE MOVED [Pk-Scape]
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:20, topic:526146”][quote author=Mattus92 link=topic=644890.msg4352371#msg4352371 date=1376884444]

PKScape is an amazing server with a lot of potential to become a large successful server.

It’s been up 6 days now and we are reaching 20-25online in peak hour, This is a great server with a very friendly and active community + The admin is extremely down to earth and ready to help with any problem you may have.

If you enjoy playing RSC servers then come and give PKScape a go Hope to see you all ingame.
[/quote]Thanks first time poster!

I’m sorry, but is me being a first time poster a problem? Or relevant to anything?
Maybe since your such an experienced moparscape forum user you could learn how to keep your posts on topic.

Also, I have another account…Older than yours I’m sure which I couldn’t remember the password too… and the email wouldn’t send so…

Good day

ya my first account was made in 1993. forgot password tho lul silly me :)[/quote]

Good server so far. Keep up the good work.

And you idiots need to keep it on topic, Your posts should be removed.

Read full topic

item.title: WE HAVE MOVED [Pk-Scape]
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

Don’t forget to vote for us : http://rscsaintz.top-site-list.com/vote/448518

Today, 16.08.2013 @ 22:30 CEET time ( 17:32 now ) we gonna host some low lvl pk event with a special reward “Green Mask” !! Requirements to join event : lvl 65 combat, no magic, no ranged, no defense allowed !! Have fun !

Cyu there.

PS: 5h left till we start event ! More events will come soon, and will be announced here and on our forum !

Latest client : http://www.fileshare.ro/e29787545

item.title: WE HAVE MOVED [Pk-Scape]
item.dc:creator: @Dustin_Gowler Dustin Gowler
item.description:
@Dustin_Gowler wrote:

Already going to fail with max stat cap above 99, No one wants this at all. The only ones who do and you will find out are the ones who have 5+ people afking their account. I don’t care what the exp rate is 99 is the perfect stat, notice rsc was the best, now all these custom severs are hyped for a week or two then die because of this.

If it is a pk sever what does it matter if the stat is 99 or 125. The only thing your doing by making it 125 is making people afk more and share accounts and cause a lot more useless training.

Read full topic

Also, won’t people just PJ with multiple accounts if you have commands to all the pking spots?

Also, do you think 15 seconds to PJ is a long enough delay?[/quote]

Ur right, will change it from 15 to 60 seconds.
